data.name: InstructionHeader
data.value: Before starting you or your partner should read these instructions aloud.

data.name: Instruction1
data.value: 1. For each question, one of us should read the prompt aloud and then we should each take a turn answering. A four minute timer is present for each question, switch turns every 2 minutes.

data.name: Instruction2
data.value: 2. It is very important to answer each question in order.

data.name: Instruction3
data.value: 3. There are three sets of questions, each with 12 questions.

data.name: Instruction4
data.value: 4. After the final set of questions we have to look at each other in the eye for 2 minutes.

data.name: Instruction5
data.value: 5. We should answer questions at a normal pace, like a conversation. Chill.

data.name: Instruction6
data.value: 6. It is ok to skip questions. We can skip questions as long as we both agree.
